thread.section_title: WowVendor.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WowVendor.com | wowvendor.com
thread.title: Brandon (Shootnscoot)

author: Brandon (Shootnscoot)
title: Brandon (Shootnscoot)
text: I kid you not guys I totally thought this was gonna be a total scam where they'd just take your money and you'd never hear from them again. So I purchased something small to see if that would happen.. And boom. They delivered perfectly...So I was like DANG, okay, so I purchased a $500 Heroic Nighthold run with Master Looter and lone and behold, not only did I have the promised 7 items, but TEN FRICKEN ITEMS!!!! Half of which Titan/warforged and I'm telling you it was the best spent money I've ever paid!!!! I also thought trust pilot was just a site they owned. No. I'm a real person, with real concerns, and these guys were prompt and quick as hell at providing their services!!! A
